Class Assert

extends java.lang.Object
    A set of assertion methods useful for writing tests.

      • assertThrows

        public static void assertThrows​(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> expectedException,
                                java.lang.String expectedMessage,
                                Assert.VoidCallable callable)
        Asserts that the callable throws the expectedException and the expectedMessage. If there's no need for the verification of the exception's error message, call assertThrows(Class<? extends Throwable>, VoidCallable) instead. {@see assertThrows(Class, VoidCallable}
